name: F1 Pole Position
overview: Experience the excitement of real racing competition. Strap on your crash helmet, settle down into the cockpit, and go head to head against the world's greatest F-1 drivers, including Nigel Mansell & Michael Andretti, on the most challenging race tracks in the world! - Three different playing modes let you race with changing road and weather conditions. - Customize and fine-tune your care using a variety of settings - Race against 2 to 4 friends using the Game Link. - Password feature lets you save your races.
